context.expression: !contact.muted && contact.contact_type === 'universal_client' && contact.patient_birthDate && summary.contactAgeInMonths >= 18 && contact.record_purpose === 'treatment_verification' && (user.role === 'kp_case_manager' || user.role === 'clinician') && (!(summary.screenedToday && summary.lastHtsService !== ''))
